detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton with twill hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Legs with short slits in the sides and raw-edge frayed hems.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the shoulders and cuffs.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, wide dress in an organic cotton weave with a V-neck and a drawstring at the top around the neckline. Buttons that fasten at one side of the neckline, cap sleeves, a vertical drawstring at the top and a seam at the hips. Straight fit at the top, a flared skirt with several layers for extra width, an asymmetric hem and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Mesh-lined side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and a concealed zip at the hems.
Long bikini top in fluted, crinkled fabric with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and discreet elastication at the hem. Gathers in the sides and an inner top with an elasticated hem. No fasteners.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with imitation leather details. Zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable fabric shoulder strap. One zipped outer compartment and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm, height 12.5 cm, width 19 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Scrunchie covered in a paisley-patterned weave.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey crêpe with a collar, press-studs down the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in an airy, pattern-weave fabric decorated with plastic sparkly stones front and back. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Padded bomber jacket in nylon with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders and a chest pocket.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Shorts in airy cotton seersucker with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a small frill trim and decorative, tasselled bow at the waist.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit cashmere jumper with long raglan sleeves in a slightly shorter style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.
Set of moisturising lip balms. One with a strawberry flavour, one with a vanilla flavour and one with a watermelon flavour. 3x4 g. Not for children under 3, as the packaging contains small parts.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Skirt in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and back pockets. Unlined.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams and reinforced palm sections. Elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.
Sports cap in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a tab and hook and loop fastener at the back. Seamless.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Ribbing around the neckline and an open chest pocket.
Long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Patterned blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with glittery details, adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Pull-on trousers in a softly draping weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, open section at the back and concealed button at the back of the neck. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Large scrunchie in an airy weave. Diameter approx. 14 cm.
Fitted knee-length dress in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short top in airy, ribbed jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and a twisted detail at the hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Fabric loafers. Heel 2 cm.
Metal earrings decorated with a polished stone and round pendants made from metal and paper straw.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a text print on the front, deep neckline and rounded hem.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Trousers in a cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front and small frill trim.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Straight-cut top in an airy weave with a gentle V-neck and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted V-neck top in sturdy, stretch microfibre with narrow shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front that fastens with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in silk with a sheen. Opening and a covered button at the back of the neck and a decorative seam front and back. Slits in the sides and long sleeves with a fit that can be adjusted using the button at the cuffs.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from approx. 1.5 cm to 2 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with lace at the hem and short slits in the sides.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and cuffed hems. Zipped side pockets and two back pockets, one with a zip.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing around the neckline.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with oversized, raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. Round, gathered neckline with an opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Metal earrings with plastic beads in various sizes.

Set with a blouse, pair of trousers and a hairband in a patterned cotton weave. Blouse with butterfly sleeves and buttons down the front. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Hairband with a twisted detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
High-waisted, semi-opaque shaping shorts with a sculpting effect on the seat, hips and waist. Longer legs. 80 denier.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and a deep opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, zip at the back and long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Lined.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long, slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
